import React,{Component} from 'react'; import Select from 'react-select'; import Calendar from 'react-calendar'; const stations = [ { label: "Wellawatte", value: 1 }, { label: "Bambalapitya", value: 2 }, { label: "Kollupitya", value: 3 }, ]; class TrainDetails extends Component { state = { date: new Date(), } onChange = date => this.setState({ date }) render() { return(

Train details
); } } const leftStyle={ position:'fixed', margin:'auto', background:'LightGrey', width:'700px', height:'500px', textAlign:'left', border: '3px solid Black', borderTopStyle:'none', top: '190px', }; const cellStyle={ height:'50px' }; const tableStyle={ width:"500px", marginLeft:'10%', marginRight:'10%' }; export default TrainDetails;
